meanings.definition: A member of a Protestant group that emphasizes the authority of the Bible and personal conversion.
meanings.sent1: Many evangelicals attend church regularly to study the Bible.
meanings.sent2: The evangelicals in our community are known for their strong faith.
meanings.sent3: The group of evangelicals organized a fun Bible study event.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for spreading the gospel made her stand out among evangelicals.
meanings.sent5: The evangelicals' dedication to their beliefs is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to evangelicals or their beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The evangelical community came together for a prayer meeting.
meanings.sent2: She shared the evangelical views on faith and salvation.
meanings.sent3: His evangelical enthusiasm for the church picnic was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The evangelical influence could be seen in the church's outreach programs.
meanings.sent5: The evangelical teachings shaped their approach to charity work.
